mapper.select: select user_id, role_id, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from sys_user_role where user_id = #{userId}

SELECT su.id, su.student_id, sui.name, su.email, su.create_time FROM sys_user su left join sys_user_info sui on sui.sys_user_id = su.id left join sys_user_role sur on sur.user_id=su.id left join sys_role sr on sr.role_id=sur.role_id WHERE su.del_flag = '0' and ( sr.role_id !=#{roleUser.roleId} OR sr.role_id IS NULL ) AND su.id NOT IN ( SELECT su.id FROM sys_user su JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.user_id = su.id AND sur.role_id =#{roleUser.roleId} )
AND sui.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{roleUser.userName}, '%')
AND su.email LIKE CONCAT(#{roleUser.email}, '%')
limit #{roleUser.pageNum},#{roleUser.pageSize}

SELECT count(*) FROM sys_user su left join sys_user_info sui on sui.sys_user_id = su.id left join sys_user_role sur on sur.user_id=su.id left join sys_role sr on sr.role_id=sur.role_id WHERE su.del_flag = '0' and ( sr.role_id !=#{roleUser.roleId} OR sr.role_id IS NULL ) AND su.id NOT IN ( SELECT su.id FROM sys_user su JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.user_id = su.id AND sur.role_id =#{roleUser.roleId} )
AND sui.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{roleUser.userName}, '%')
AND su.email LIKE CONCAT(#{roleUser.email}, '%')
limit #{roleUser.pageNum},#{roleUser.pageSize}
